item.title: Now Use Material-UI Icons With Super Ease
item.description: Instead of searching for icons in Material icons, and then trying to figure out what the required icon component name would look like, now you can directly search for any icon among 1,000+ official Material icons converted to svg icon components. Wonderinghow you can use the Material Design icons? We are happy tounveil our new icons search directly built in the documentationüîç‚ú®.https://t.co/RoWxQ7Tib3pic.twitter.com/k5yCMIC7xt— Material-UI (@MaterialUI) August21, 2019
